name: Climbing by Maim
description:
Climb to the top to gather the crown!

A climbing game that was inspired by games like Getting Over it, where the mechanics are hard unless you know what you are doing.  Created for ScoreSpace Jam #9.

Control Tutorial:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rXA1lvBwrmI

Basic Controls:

Right Mouse | Control Green: Used for bow string position and pulling up.

Left Mouse | Control Bow String: Used for firing projectle. (and teleporting ;)

Middle Mouse | Moves camera up: Used for having a look at the map.

R | Restarts Game.

X | Resets highscore.

Developer:

All assets, sounds and code  was created by Maim solely for this game jam.
